com.intechcore.scomponents.scell.api.spreadsheet.service

Interface IStyleService


  • public interface IStyleService
    Represents a cell style service used to set or change the properties of the cell style

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • updateCommon

        void updateCommon(IRangeAddress range,
                  UnaryOperator<IStyle> editor)
        Edit a common style in the range. Allows to apply the properties of the style to the selected range of cells.

        'Common' means here the following: the value of each attribute of the style is not null when all cells from the selected area have the same value of the attribute. The value of the attribute is null when the style properties of a cell or cells are different from the properties of the other cells in the range

        Edit only the attributes that are not null. Otherwise, use the updateCommon(IRangeAddress, Consumer) which is more convenient

        Parameters:
        range - the IRangeAddress in which the settings will be applied
        editor - the function which takes the current common style and produces the new style to be applied
        See Also:
        UnaryOperator, IStyle

      • updateCommon

        void updateCommon(IRangeAddress range,
                  Consumer<IStyleBuilder> builderConsumer)
        Edits a common style in the range. For convenience, the method gives the IStyleBuilder with the current properties of the common style. The function calls IStyleBuilder.build() and then updateCommon(IRangeAddress, UnaryOperator)
        Parameters:
        range - the IRangeAddress in which the settings will be applied
        builderConsumer - the function which takes IStyleBuilder filled with the current properties of the common style
        See Also:
        Consumer, IStyle

      • updateEach

        void updateEach(IRangeAddress range,
                UnaryOperator<IStyle> editor)
        Edits the style of each cell in the given range. Applies the properties of the style to the selected range of cells.
        Parameters:
        range - the IRangeAddress in which the settings will be applied
        editor - the function which takes the current common style and produces the new style to be applied
        See Also:
        UnaryOperator, IStyle

      • updateEach

        void updateEach(IRangeAddress range,
                Consumer<IStyleBuilder> builderConsumer)
        Edits the style of each cell in the given range. Applies the properties of the style to the selected range of cells.
        Parameters:
        range - the IRangeAddress in which the settings will be applied
        builderConsumer - the function which takes IStyleBuilder filled with the current properties of the common style
        See Also:
        Consumer, IStyle

      • set

        void set(int colNum,
         int rowNum,
         IStyle style)
        Sets the style in the single cell.

        In the case of incorrect row/column numbers the IndexOutOfBoundsException will be thrown

        Parameters:
        colNum - the column number
        rowNum - the row number
        style - the style to set

      • set

        void set(String range,
         IStyle style)
        Sets the style to range of cells with the given String with values like "A4" or "D4:G10"

        In the case of the incorrect string value the ParseRangeAddressException will be thrown

        Parameters:
        range - the cells range
        style - the value
        See Also:
        IStyle

      • set

        void set(IRangeAddress range,
         IStyle style)
        Sets the style in the range of cells
        Parameters:
        range - the IRangeAddress in which the settings will be applied
        style - the style to be set
        See Also:
        IRangeAddress, IStyle

      • set

        void set(IRangeAddress range,
         Consumer<IStyleBuilder> builderConsumer)
        Sets the font in the range of cells. For convenience, the user consumes a new instance of the IStyleBuilder into which the desired values will be filled in. The builder is instantiated from the IScellApiResolver so that the user could register his own implementation using custom default data. The function calls IStyleBuilder.build() and set(IRangeAddress, IStyle) with the obtained data result
        Parameters:
        range - the IRangeAddress in which the settings will be applied
        builderConsumer - the Consumer with a new instance of IStyleBuilder
        See Also:
        IRangeAddress, IStyle

      • clear

        void clear(IRangeAddress range)
        Clears the style in the range of cells
        Parameters:
        range - the IRangeAddress in which the clearing will be applied
        See Also:
        IRangeAddress
